screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .stel file in Robert Webb Great Stella
screenshot.caption: STEL file open in Robert Webb Great Stella

description: The Stella suite, which consists of Small Stella, Great Stella, and Stella4D, allows you to view and create 3D polyhedra. Stella users can save a polyhedron as a STEL file by selecting File â†’ Save as... .

Each STEL file contains all the data Stella needs to show the polyhedron it describes to a user. This includes a record of the model, the model's current stellation, the model's facets, whether the model is spinning, morphing, or folding, and the user's current screen layout and views.
